content:
A "massive" landslide between Kernville and Siletz has closed Highway 229 indefinitely, according to the Oregon Department of Transportation.
The landslide, reported 10 miles north of Siletz around … [+857 chars]
de: „Massiver“ Erdrutsch sperrt den Highway 229 in der Nähe von Siletz auf unbestimmte Zeit. Nach Angaben des Oregon Department of Transportation hat ein „massiver“ Erdrutsch zwischen Kernville und Siletz den Highway 229 auf unbestimmte Zeit gesperrt.
en: 'Massive' landslide closes Highway 229 indefinitely near Siletz. A "massive" landslide between Kernville and Siletz has closed Highway 229 indefinitely, according to the Oregon Department of Transportation.
la: "Magna" LAPSUS claudit viam 229 indefinite prope Siletz. Lapsus "magnus" inter Kernville et Siletz viam 229 indefinite claudit, secundum Department of Oregon Transportationis.
